comments.body: Why do you need These two module declarations here?

This module does monkey patching for `moment` and/or `moment-timezone` modules. It works similar to `moment-timezone` which patches `moment` module. See: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/6bd9be2e366c54038ba218c989f236759b75fd54/types/moment-timezone/index.d.ts#L11 for comparision.
@sheetalkamat ah, about question, why both modules, not just only `moment`? Well, you can test it in `moment-strftime2-tests.ts`. Adding this interface only to first module is not enough.
